name: Underworld Poison
description:
A young man is greeting at sister's tea table. She is excited about a new tea she got from a stranger. Things are about to change ...

Submission for the Spooktober jam.

This VN has 3D characters and animation.

Made with Flax Engine and Ink script.

Controls:

Skip story: mouse left click or spacebar

Choice navigation: arrow up/down

Choice selection: mouse left click or enter

Exit game: Esc

Credits

Story and programming: Miniputs

3D characters: Readyplayer.me  +  Sketchfab artists: Andriano Milanovic, TooManyDemons, aflo18

Backgrounds: Itch.io artist: Lornn  +  Artstation artist: Stefanie Arndorfer
